pages.text: $(bold)Help! Why goes my game keep crashing?$()$(br2)Again, various reasons. Your game is bound to crash regardless of how stable it is. I can experience a wide variety of crashing myself. Most of the time, it’s just a one time occurrence, but there are a few frequent types of crashes I’m aware about. Unfortunately, they are usually
out of my control. I’m going to list all of the types of reoccurring crashes on our $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://discord.gg/cGxnWKQhpU)Discord in the bugs channel$(/l)$() if I haven’t already.
